reviews.review: 剧情起伏曲折，对话充满乐趣，解谜难度适中，可惜g胖不数3。双人合作十分有毒，甚至比单人剧情更有趣。
一款难度刚好的经典解密游戏，剧情和游戏内的音乐也很吸引人。
It has all the things you love about Portal and more puzzles.Play with caution though, as lines in the game can get stuck in your brain all day and you won't be able to stop saying "I'm a potato".

Portal is by far the best Puzzle game ever,and one of the best games ever made.And it's thanks to him that games try and inovate with different play-styles(Ex.:Perspective,Stanley Parable)
The story has everything,it has backstory,mistery,humor and very depressing momments,not the kinda of "Oh! I'm going to cry! This is so sentimental",but the kind that makes you THINK,even after you had ended the game years ago,you will still remember an element of the story,maybe with a new meaning to you this time,and just realise how sad that trully is.The characters are few,but besides the Main character(that does not speak) everyone is charismatic at the extreme and you'll miss them once you beat the game.Anyway,really,you should buy it,if it's too expensive,wait a prommotion.But you HAVE to play it,it's not just a famous game,it's an unique one that I doubt it will ever be replaced.

I wholeheartedly recommend this game to new Steam users. I say new, because by now this game is an essential classic that every veteran steam user should have in their collection. The amazing portal gameplay that makes you think outside of the box, the complex puzzles, the engaging yet secret story that is only gradualy revealed and makes you want to continue playing, it's all here. A great game overall, and one that I can't say any should pass up.

En fin para mi uno de mis juegos favoritos recomendo al 100%

If you want a  cool puzzle based game with a fantastic storyline, this is for you. It's one of those games where you will spend hours on a puzzle, only to emerge victorious at 3am and wonder why you didn't think of that in the first place. Even when you complete the story, there's coop levels, and online levels created by users. 10/10 most likely my favorite game.

portal foi um fenomeno na sua epoca pelo gameplay criativo e uma vilã super bem desenvolvida e cativante, voce nao consegue sentir raiva da glados, pq seu carisma é maior.
agora com portal 2 elevaram a franquia as alturas, alcançando os grandes AAA, com uma historia maior e MUITO BEM ESCRITA, agora nao é so um personagens, sao varios e muito bem desenvolvidos, voce se apega facilmente a todos eles, gameplay inovado, nao muito, pois nao poderia fugir muito da tematica do game.

enfim, portal 2 é para mim um dos melhores jogos de toda a historia dos videogames, um jogo muito inteligente, didatico, e fluido, nada se repete, e voce so se surpreende durante a jogatina.

Just a little pros and cons list.

[h1] Graphics [/h1] 4/5 - Very nice, but there's certainly room for improvement.

[h1] Sound design [/h1] 5/5 - Can't find any issues.

[h1] Puzzles [/h1] 3/5 - Pretty average, not as good as Portal 1.

[h1] Story/cutscenes [/h1] 5/5 - The lore of this game is great, one of its strongest assets.

[h1] Design [/h1] 5/5 - Certainly not as great as the first game, but still a beacon of excelence.

[h1] Performance/options [/h1] 4.5/5 -  Performance is great even on low end computers, and the options menu checks out. (note, lacks colourblind options, I believe)

[h1] Difficulty [/h1] 3.5/5 - Far too easy for me, may be fine for casual players.


[h1] [u] OVERALL [u] [h1] 4.5/5 - Can you call yourself a gamer if you haven't played Portal 2?

It was a very fun game. I got it for free with the steam controller and decided to play it through. The story line is nice and I was not too too lost because I had not played the first one. Yes, get this game and enjoy it.

Portal 2 greatly improved and expanded the story and gameplay of the first Portal game but can still feel like the gameplay length is on the shorter side.

Portal 2's story is funny and simplistic as it can be for a puzzle game. The funny dialogs in-game make your playthrough the game levels much more enjoyable and memorable and are often more than enough to distract you from getting too frustrated if you are stuck on figuring out the level's puzzle solution. There are a handful of hidden treats of dialogs for you to discover throughout the levels by goofing around the level or making mistakes that you thought were the answer to solving the puzzles.

Valve has done an amazing job making most, if not all, the game level very atmospheric. Ranging from the looks of the level to the sounds you hear moving or just looking around. The old mechanics added with new ones also made the game much more refreshing as each mechanic are introduced to you gradually. Combining each of the things you learned thoughout your playthrough is VERY rewarding and makes you feel really smart in figuring out how to solve the level's puzzles.

The co-op multiplayer is best played with a friend rather than matching with someone else online. Communication and coordination are major keys in moving forward in the co-op levels. You can't move forward in the level if you will leave your partner behind. There are plenty of time to goof around & mess with your partner. The levels are very forgiving if you fall to your horrible horrible death or your partner press the shiny red button far too early or too late. 

The steam workshop support is great if you want more level puzzles to solve but they often won't have the funny and clever dialogs you'll find in the main game.

In conclusion, Portal 2 is a short and funny puzzle game experience that can leave you with a lot of hilarious memories playing either on single player or co-op mode.
Melhor vilão

PORTAL 2 - Análisis

Si quieres un juego en el que haya una muy buena Jugabilidad, unos muy buenos Puzzles y una excelente Historia, ESTE ES TU JUEGO. 

También podrás jugar el modo Cooperativo con algún amigo que tenga este gran juego y también podrás jugar al Editor de Niveles, en el cual podrás hacer los niveles que quieras y cómo quieras e incluso mandarlos a la comunidad y que cualquier persona que tenga este gran juego, podrá jugar a los niveles que hayas hecho.

Además tiene unos Gráficos Excelentes y No se cae a Trozos, Tiene un muy buen rendimiento.

Este juego primero lo había jugado en la versión de Xbox 360 y fue un juego que me encantó y cuando vi que había un modo de Crear niveles en la versión de PC/Mac decidí comprarlo aquí en Steam, el cual lo compré a un preció muy bueno.

Este ha sido uno de los mejores videojuegos que he jugado en mi vida y he estado muy viciado al editor de niveles y jugando a algunos niveles hechos por la comunidad.

En caso de que no hayas jugado el PORTAL 1, te recomendaría jugarlo para poder entender la historia sin problemas y saber lo que sucedió.

En un resumen de aspectos positivos, neutrales y negativos podría resumirlo así.

+ PROS +

+ Sonido
+ Historia
+ Gráficos
+ Jugabilidad
+ Optimización
+ Ambientación
+ Editor de Niveles
+ Modo Cooperativo

• NEUTRAL • 

• Ninguno

- CONTRAS -

- Ninguno

Mi Valoración 100/100.

Это лучшее, что я играл за последние 10 лет! Когда проходишь первый раз, начинает болеть голова от головоломок. Иногда было головокружение, от прохождения через порталы. Игра как минимум заслуживает, чтобы ее прошли.

This is one of my favorite games of all time. The narrative, the storyline, the CHARACTERS, the humor (specially GLaDOS') is brilliant! I enjoy each level and the increase in difficulty is pretty great and comprehensible. The songs live with me everyday (got them on my iPod and on playlists on Spotify). This is a game that will live through time and it'll still be enjoyable after a long time.
